Please click on the card stack to select: Please click on the card stack to select the next card.
Name: Name
Would you like to start a new round with: Would you like to start a new round with the same players?
Select the desired players to include or: Select the desired players to include or exclude.
By default, all previous players are sel: By default, all previous players are selected.
Click 'Yes' to continue with the selecte: Click 'Yes' to continue with the selected players, or 'No' to start without them.
One player from the last round has alrea: A player from the last round has already started a new game with the same teammates.
Everyone has to start drinking at the sa: Everyone has to start drinking at the same time. As soon as player 1 stops drinking, player 2 may stop drinking. Player 3 may stop as soon as player 2 stops drinking, and so on.
Come up with a category (e.g. Colors). E: Come up with a category (e.g. Colors). Each player must enumerate one item from the category.
Player 1 makes a dance move. Player 2 re: Player 1 makes a dance move. Player 2 repeats the dance move and adds a second one.
Put your hands up! The last player drink: Put your hands up! The last player drinks!
Pick a mate. Your mate must always drink: Pick a mate. Your mate must always drink when you drink and the other way around.
When you become the Thumbmaster, you can: When you become the Thumbmaster, you can put your thumb on the table at any time. The last person to put their thumb on the table has to drink.
As the Quizmaster, you can ask anyone a: As the Quizmaster, you can ask anyone a question at any time. If they refuse to answer, they have to drink.
Say something you never did. Everyone wh: Say something you never did. Everyone who did it has to drink.
Make a rule. Everyone needs to drink whe: Make a rule. Everyone needs to drink when he breaks the rule.
